FranticFling

Frantic Fling is a prove on concept game, the idea was to create a traditional mobile game with, and I know it sounds bad but, ads.

The Idea was to keep the game simple. Something that doesn't require outstanding graphics, but is instead made out of simple shapes. This felt
more at home for me as I have barely if any skills in the art side of making games. I just keep to the programming.

The game was created in a short time. As at that point I also still worked at Brin and couldn't just do as I pleased.
The goal of the game is to fling your ball up as high as you can, while
avoiding randomly generated obstacles. During this you'll also need to keep moving up as a rising lava is contantly trying to catch up with you.

During the game some extra challanges precent itself. These are in the
form of green coins apearing. Collecting enough of these allow you to buy new skins for your ball. Usually just some other colors, but the most expencive one is a rainbow. Another challange added to the game was the addition of extra obstacles the further you go. For example, after a while the walls on the left and right of the screen become lava as wel. This is of course told to the player via waring labels.
